name: Raspberry Lime Iced Tea
keywords: brewed tea, lime, raspberries, dairy-free, gluten-free, low-fat, low-sodium, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 6 tablespoons sugar, plus more to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Place the raspberries, 6 table spoons sugar and lime juice in a food processor and process until very smooth. Strain through a fine sieve. Whisk the raspberry mixture into the tea. Place in a pitcher and refrigerate until cold. Whisk in additional sugar if desired. Serve over ice, garnished with lime slices.
